Welcome to
Lions Camp Horizon

Where everyone belongs! Spreading sunshine, smiles and the joy of summer camp to teens and adults of all abilities for over 50 years.

At Lions Camp Horizon, abilities—not disabilities—guide us. We provide safe, joyful summer camp experiences that build confidence, independence, and lifelong friendships.

Contact Us
Our Legacy

Celebrating 50 Years of Camp Horizon

Since 1974, Lions Camp Horizon has been creating a safe place for teens and adults with disabilities to laugh, grow and belong.  What began as a single week of camp for 17 campers at the Lynden Fair Grounds has grown into a vibrant summer tradition.  Today, we are proud to call Bay Horizon Park our home, where we welcome up to 55 campers a week during our camp season to experience friendship, adventure and endless summer fun. 

Learn Our Story >
Lions Camp Horizon's First 50 Years

Camp Horizon is all about friendships, loving counselors and making summer memories!

Megan H.Lions Camp Horizon Camper
